titleStmt.title: A hand of fellovvship, to helpe keepe out sinne and Antichrist In certaine sermons preached vpon seuerall occasions: by Robert Abbot ...
titleStmt.author: Abbot, Robert, 1588?-1662?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: "Davids desires. The assize at home"; "The hid man of the heart"; "A preventer of securitie"; "The new mans life"; and "The trial of true religion" each have separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
